about_the_game:
Arise, lowly foreigner, and embark on an epic quest! Unravel the mysteries of this fantasy world, slay the monster that threatens to crumble it, and save it from its own destruction. Or, if you're feeling more ambitious, profit from its collapse.

In this vast and wondrous land, you can be anything you dream of. A humble farmer, a wealthy trader, a brave soldier, a skilled craftsman, a powerful mage, a cunning thief, a fearsome bandit, or even a mighty lord.

The choice is yours. But whatever path you choose, know that your journey will be fraught with danger and excitement. You will face fearsome monsters, cunning villains, and treacherous quests. But if you are brave and resourceful, you will overcome all challenges and achieve greatness.

Will you become a farmer, tilling the land and providing food for your community? Or will you become a trader, traveling the world and bringing goods to those who need them? Perhaps you will become a soldier, fighting for your country and protecting your people? Or maybe you will become a craftsman, creating objects of beauty and utility?

The possibilities are endless. The only limit is your imagination. So what are you waiting for? Start your epic adventure today!


PS: As this is an Early Access > there are currently Quests, Locations & Combat, with more features planned to be added in the coming months.
Current set of developed features (more will be added here as they are completed):
- Quests (fetch / kill / talk)
- Shopping (Weapons, Armors & Abilities)
- Player Character Traits (Strength, Dexterity, Constitution, Intelligence, Charisma)
- Combat (melee, ranged & magic weapons)
- Crafting (Potions, Weapons, Armor)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 64-bit Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 470 1GB /AMD HD 7870 2GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel i5-750/AMD Phenom II X4-945
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 470 1GB /AMD HD 7870 2GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card

short_description: Our game aims to offer a more casual RPG experience brimming with quests, combat, crafting and more. Our goal is to ensure it's effortless to pick up and play. Complete quests according to your preferences – whether through combat, dialogue, evasion, or even by hiring someone to handle the task
